title: Universal synthesis strategy for preparation of transition metal oxide electrocatalysts doped with noble metal single atoms for oxygen evolution reaction
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00238E, Paper

Jingyao Wang, Yiming Zhu, Xuepeng Zhong, Zhiwei Hu, Wei-Hsiang Huang, Chih-Wen Pao, Hongfei Cheng, Nicolas Alonso-Vante, Jiwei Ma
A universal salt-template method for the preparation of various noble metals-doped 3d-transition metal oxides electrocatalysts was developed.
